div.h1:
Francisco Vasquez de Coronado Elementary School
Coronado school is dedicated to educating the whole student, to enlightening the mind and to nurturing the body and spirit of each child.

New - WELCOME TO KINDER AT CORONADO

div.h2: Welcome to Francisco Vasquez de Coronado Elementary School!

p.span: Welcome to Francisco Vasquez de Coronado Elementary School. We are a A+ School of Excellence in the Nogales Unified District in southern Arizona. Our school lies just minutes from the Mexico border in beautiful Santa Cruz County, in Nogales, Arizonas largest international border town.

Bienvenidos a la Escuela Primaria Francisco Vsquez de Coronado. Somos una Escuela de Excelencia A + en el Distrito Unificado de Nogales en el sur de Arizona. Nuestra escuela se encuentra a solo minutos de la frontera con Mxico en el hermoso condado de Santa Cruz, en Nogales, la ciudad fronteriza internacional ms grande de Arizona.
Dear Coronado Families,

Welcome to Francisco Vasquez de Coronado Elementary School an A+ School of Excellence! With our core values in mind, we look forward to providing educational excellence in every classroom, for every student, every day.
The first day of school will be
. The family Meet n Greet event will be on

strong.span: Tuesday, August 6, 2019 from 1:00 PM to 3:00 PM

p.span: On the day of the Meet n Greet, Kindergarten classroom lists will be made available.

span.style: color: rgb(89, 89, 89); background: white; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial;

p.span: In partnership with students, parents and the community, the Coronado Elementary faculty and staff are dedicated to excellence in education.
We are committed to preparing lifelong learners and future generations of productive citizens as we value each student as an individual.

span.style: color: rgb(89, 89, 89); background: white; font-size: 12pt; font-family: Arial;
